Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) successfully accessed %3, the device interface class is unrestricted and allows access for LPAC apps.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) successfully accessed %3, the device interface class is unrestricted.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) successfully accessed %3, the app is granted unrestricted access based on its capabilities.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) successfully accessed %3, the device container grants this app unrestricted access (i.e. legacy privileged app).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) successfully accessed %3, the system is in embedded mode and the app has the low level devices capability.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the user cannot access the device (error = %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the interface class is unrestricted but does not allow LPAC apps access (error = %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the interface class is restricted and the app is LPAC (error = %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message:
%1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the interface class is custom and nothing gives the app access (error = %4).
One of the following methods may be used to grant an app access to a custom device: - an interface class may define access policy for either allowing unrestricted access or access restricted to a specific capability - a device interface instance may grant access to apps based on well-known or custom capabilities - (Deprecated) Privileged App Support: device metadata may grant access to specific PFNs associated to device container's PnP state
Note: custom capabilities are typically the correct way to enable an app to access a custom device.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the interface class is restricted by policy (error = %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the interface instance is restricted (error = %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the interface class does not allow raw handles to the device (error = %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: %1 (pid = %2) failed to access %3, the capability access check was denied (error = %4).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ClientFileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientPid" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfacePath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Error" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
